AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sfbtr_budget_area_line
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_area_id in (SELECT c.sfb_budget_area_id FROM (SELECT b.* FROM sfb_budget b JOIN sfbtr_budgetary_reforms br on br.type_of_budget = b.type_of_budget AND b.c_year_id = br.c_year_id WHERE br.sfbtr_budgetary_reforms_id=@sfbtr_budgetary_reforms_id@) a JOIN sfb_budget_version b on a.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id JOIN sfb_budget_line c on b.sfb_budget_version_id = c.sfb_budget_version_id WHERE b.version_status = 'AP' )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sfbtr_budget_area
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filtra los productos que corresponden a las líneas del presupuesto según el tipo de presupuesto y el ejercicio definido en la cabecera.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_area_id in (SELECT c.sfb_budget_area_id FROM sfb_budget a JOIN sfb_budget_version b on a.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id JOIN sfb_budget_line c on b.sfb_budget_version_id = c.sfb_budget_version_id WHERE a.type_of_budget =@Type_Of_Budget@ AND a.c_year_id = @C_Year_ID@ AND b.version_status = 'AP' )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sfbtr_sfb_budget_item
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filtra las partidas de las líneas del presupuesto que pertenecen según la configuración del tipo de presupuesto, Ejercicio, Producto, Actividad y Fuente de Financiamiento.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_item_id in ( SELECT c.sfb_budget_item_id FROM sfb_budget a JOIN sfb_budget_version b on a.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id JOIN sfb_budget_line c on b.sfb_budget_version_id = c.sfb_budget_version_id WHERE b.version_status = 'AP' AND a.type_of_budget =@Type_Of_Budget@ AND a.c_year_id = @C_Year_ID@ AND c.sfb_budget_area_id = @Sfb_Budget_Area_ID@ AND c.c_costcenter_id =@C_Costcenter_ID@ AND c.user1_id = @User1_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sfbtr_User1
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filtra los user1 de las líneas del presupuesto al que pertenecen según la configuración del tipo de presupuesto, Ejercicio, producto y Actividad.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: user1_id in (SELECT c.user1_id FROM sfb_budget a JOIN sfb_budget_version b on a.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id JOIN sfb_budget_line c on b.sfb_budget_version_id = c.sfb_budget_version_id WHERE b.version_status = 'AP' AND a.type_of_budget =@Type_Of_Budget@ AND a.c_year_id = @C_Year_ID@ AND c.sfb_budget_area_id = @Sfb_Budget_Area_ID@ AND c.c_costcenter_id =@C_Costcenter_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sfbtr_CostCenter_line
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_costcenter_id in (SELECT c.c_costcenter_id FROM (SELECT b.* FROM sfb_budget b JOIN sfbtr_budgetary_reforms br on br.type_of_budget = b.type_of_budget AND b.c_year_id = br.c_year_id WHERE br.sfbtr_budgetary_reforms_id =@sfbtr_budgetary_reforms_id@) a JOIN sfb_budget_version b on a.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id JOIN sfb_budget_line c on b.sfb_budget_version_id = c.sfb_budget_version_id WHERE b.version_status = 'AP' AND c.sfb_budget_area_id = @Sfb_Budget_Area_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sfbtr_User1_line
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: user1_id in (SELECT c.user1_id FROM (SELECT b.* FROM sfb_budget b JOIN sfbtr_budgetary_reforms br on br.type_of_budget = b.type_of_budget AND b.c_year_id = br.c_year_id WHERE br.sfbtr_budgetary_reforms_id =@sfbtr_budgetary_reforms_id@) a JOIN sfb_budget_version b on a.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id JOIN sfb_budget_line c on b.sfb_budget_version_id = c.sfb_budget_version_id WHERE b.version_status = 'AP' AND c.sfb_budget_area_id = @Sfb_Budget_Area_ID@ AND c.c_costcenter_id =@C_Costcenter_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sfbtr_CostCenter
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filtra los centros de costo de las líneas del presupuesto al que pertenecen según la configuración del tipo de presupuesto, Ejercicio y Producto.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_costcenter_id in (SELECT c.c_costcenter_id FROM sfb_budget a JOIN sfb_budget_version b on a.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id JOIN sfb_budget_line c on b.sfb_budget_version_id = c.sfb_budget_version_id WHERE b.version_status = 'AP' AND a.type_of_budget =@Type_Of_Budget@ AND a.c_year_id = @C_Year_ID@ AND c.sfb_budget_area_id = @Sfb_Budget_Area_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sfbtr_sfb_budget_item_line
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: sfb_budget_item_id in ( SELECT c.sfb_budget_item_id FROM (SELECT b.* FROM sfb_budget b JOIN sfbtr_budgetary_reforms br on br.type_of_budget = b.type_of_budget AND b.c_year_id = br.c_year_id WHERE br.sfbtr_budgetary_reforms_id =@sfbtr_budgetary_reforms_id@) a JOIN sfb_budget_version b on a.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id JOIN sfb_budget_line c on b.sfb_budget_version_id = c.sfb_budget_version_id WHERE b.version_status = 'AP' AND c.sfb_budget_area_id = @Sfb_Budget_Area_ID@ AND c.c_costcenter_id =@C_Costcenter_ID@ AND c.user1_id = @User1_ID@)
